verbose_text: Corresponding to the increased ability of mDC from Nt2 patients to prime Tfh like cells in vitro, we also noted the increased secretion of interleukin-12 (IL-12), a cytokine with a critical role in Tfh priming, and IL-6 in mDCs from Nt2 at baseline and after stimulation with TLR8 and TLR2 ligands; enhanced expression of IL-12 and IL-6 was observed using protein and mRNA expression analysis techniques (XREF_FIG E, XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY D, and S8E; XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY).
